title: Song and dance as ‘Nairobi News’ reporter weds ‘Taifa Leo’ editor - PHOTOS - Nairobi News
text:
Song and dance as ‘Nairobi News’ reporter weds ‘Taifa Leo’ editor – PHOTOS Posted on Feb 21, 2017 197 Views Mr and Mrs Wyclife Muia cut their wedding cake at a colorful wedding ceremony held at Tayiana Gardens on February 18, 2017. The couple works for the Nation Media Group. PHOTOS | FRANCIS NDERITU By NAIROBI NEWS REPORTER 
There was song and dance as Nairobi News reporter Evelyne Musambi and Wycliffe Muia of Taifa Leo tied the knot at a colourful wedding on Saturday. 
The wedding was held at the Tayiana Gardens on Northern Bypass on Saturday. Hundreds of family, friends and colleagues witnessed as the two said ‘I do’ at the lavish wedding. Nation Media Group (NMG) Editorial Administration Manager Peter Ngare (left) presents gift vouchers to Wyclife Muia and Evelyne Musambi during their wedding at Tayiana Gardens February 18, 2017. PHOTOS | FRANCIS NDERITU Nation Media Group (NMG) Editorial Administration Manager Peter Ngare (left) presents gift vouchers to Wyclife Muia and Evelyne Musambi during their wedding at Tayiana Gardens February 18, 2017. PHOTOS | FRANCIS NDERITU 
At Nairobi News , we wish the newlyweds a happy marriage! Latest Stories
